example.eg: The witch tilted the bottle carefully, adding precisely three drops to her potion.
example.egtrans: 女巫小心翼翼地倾斜小瓶，向药剂中精确加入三滴药。

example.eg: I just felt a drop of rain.
example.egtrans: 刚才我感觉到有一滴雨滴下。

example.eg: The stock's drop in value surprised analysts.
example.egtrans: 股票价格的下跌使分析师们都大感意外。

example.eg: He dropped his keys on the pavement.
example.egtrans: 他一失手，钥匙掉在了人行道上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 失手落下, 失手掉下

example.eg: The table tennis player dropped the ball on the table to serve.
example.egtrans: 乒乓球运动员让球自由落下并挥拍发球。

example.eg: The water level will drop at low tide.
example.egtrans: 退潮时，水位会下降。

example.eg: The stock dropped today.
example.egtrans: 今天股票跌了。

example.eg: The weak market dropped the stock by thirty points.
example.egtrans: 市场疲软导致股票下跌30点。

example.eg: The project was dropped after it was found to be unprofitable.  She decided to drop her geology class.
example.egtrans: 在发现该项目不能赚钱后，项目被放弃。她决定放弃地质课。

example.eg: Just put a drop of ointment on the wound. She didn't have a drop of sympathy for the man.
example.egtrans: 在伤口上滴一滴药膏就可以了。 她对那个男人没有丝毫同情。

example.eg: The plane's drop scared everyone.
example.egtrans: 飞机陡然下降，把所有人都吓坏了。

example.eg: This ski slope has a five hundred metre drop.
example.egtrans: 这条滑雪坡道有长达500米的陡坡。

example.eg: The drop of the merchandise is supposed to take place before three o'clock.
example.egtrans: 货物应该在三点前送达。

example.eg: The drop occurred in a park close to the CIA building.
example.egtrans: 情报是在中情局大楼附近的一个公园秘密传递的。

example.eg: He bought some cough drops to soothe his sore throat.
example.egtrans: 他买了些咳嗽糖来缓解嗓子疼。

example.eg: Yeah, we had a good drop today.  The sky was clear and we could see for miles.
example.egtrans: 太好了，今天我们空投非常顺利。当时天空晴朗无云，我们能看出去好几英里以外。

example.eg: The drop was lowered onto the stage as a background for the day scene.
example.egtrans: 幕布降到舞台上，为白日场景设好背景。

example.eg: The drop opened and the convict was executed by hanging.
example.egtrans: 下落板打开，罪犯被执行绞刑。

example.eg: Eye drops might help take away your itch and redness.
Rain began dropping from the sky.
example.egtrans: 雨水开始从天空滴落。

dsense.name: drop
dsense.guideword: figurative, slang (new music: be released) (音乐、歌曲等)

example.eg: The singer's new album dropped yesterday and is receiving rave reviews.
The telephone call was dropped and he had to call again.
example.egtrans: 电话断了，他只得重新打过。

example.eg: It was obvious that he was from Boston because he kept dropping his r's.
example.egtrans: 很明显他来自波士顿，因为他说话时不断省去 r 这个音。

example.eg: They dropped him as a customer after he started complaining too much.
example.egtrans: 他投诉太多，所以他们把他从顾客名单里除名了。

example.eg: Please drop me in town when you go to buy groceries.
example.egtrans: 你去买食品杂货时请顺便在市区把我放下。

example.eg: I'll drop you a postcard when we get there.
example.egtrans: 我们到那儿后，我会给你寄一张明信片。

example.eg: Mary has dropped another baby.  That's seven she's got now!
The aid organisation often drops supplies from planes into disaster areas.
example.egtrans: 援助组织常常通过空投，将补给送入受灾地区。

dsense.name: drop [sth]
dsense.guideword: informal (lose through gambling, spend) (在赌博中)

example.eg: He dropped a thousand dollars at the casino over the weekend.
example.egtrans: 一个周末，他在赌场输掉了一千美金。

example.eg: The Red Sox dropped two games to the Yankees yesterday.
example.egtrans: 红袜队昨日输掉了两场与洋基队的比赛。

example.eg: The addict dropped a lot of acid while he was alive.
example.egtrans: 那位瘾君子生前吞服了许多致幻毒品。

dsense.name: drop around, also UK: drop round

example.eg: Steve dropped round earlier, while you were out; I said you'd phone him when you got back.
example.egtrans: 你早先出门的时候，史蒂夫来串门了；我告诉他你回来就会给他打电话。

dsense.name: drop around, also UK: drop [sth] round

example.eg: As you'll be passing my house anyway, could you drop that paperwork around?
example.egtrans: 反正你要经过我家，能不能顺便把那份文件带来？

example.eg: The edge of the cliff dropped away.
Towards the end of the race, Stacey was becoming tired and started dropping back.
Our son has dropped behind at school, so he has to repeat a year.
Peter dropped by earlier this afternoon.
example.egtrans: 彼得今天下午早些时候来过。

example.eg: Could you please drop by the pharmacy and pick up my medication?
example.egtrans: 你能顺道到药房去拿下我的药吗？

example.eg: Click here and a list of options will drop down.
example.egtrans: 单击这里，就能下拉出一个选项菜单。

example.eg: I just dropped in to tell you about the party on Saturday.
example.egtrans: 我顺便拜访就是为了告诉你周六派对的事。

example.eg: Matilda enjoys dropping in  unannounced on her friends.
Sales have dropped off dramatically since the start of the credit crunch.
example.egtrans: 自从信贷紧缩以来，销售量就大幅下降。

example.eg: I dropped off at the wheel and crashed the car.
example.egtrans: 我开车时睡着了，结果发生了撞车。

dsense.name: drop [sb] off, drop off [sb]
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (let out of a vehicle)

example.eg: I drop my husband off at work every morning.
example.egtrans: 我每天早上送丈夫去上班。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 送某人去, 开车带某人去

example.eg: Don't forget to drop the keys off at your mother's before you go.
example.egtrans: 你走之前别忘了把钥匙送到你妈妈家。

example.eg: The driver of the car leading the race dropped out with engine trouble.  Karen got into college, but she found the work too hard and dropped out in her first year.
example.egtrans: 那辆领先的车的车手因为发动机故障退赛了。凯伦上了大学，不过因为功课太难，她在大一的时候就辍学了。

example.eg: In the 60's, like so many young people in that era, he dropped out for a while and went to live in a hippy commune.
example.egtrans: 在60年代，像许多那个年代的年轻人一样，他逃避了一会儿现实社会，住进了一个嬉皮公社。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 退出现实社会，逃避现实社会

dsense.name: a drop in the bucket
dsense.guideword: US, informal, figurative (amount: trivial) (非正式用语)

example.eg: The U.S. needs to redevelop passenger rail; Amtrak funding is just a drop in the bucket.

dsense.name: a drop in the ocean (UK), a drop in the bucket (US)

example.eg: The money I give to charity is a drop in the ocean compared to some people.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 微不足道, 无足轻重

dsense.name: at the drop of a hat

example.eg: That girl is so emotional, she'll start crying at the drop of a hat.

dsense.name: cough drop, also UK: cough sweet

example.eg: The cough drops helped to relieve Mac's sore throat.  I prefer cherry-flavored cough drops.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 秘密投放点, 秘密存放点

dsense.name: drop [sb] a line, drop a line to [sb]

example.eg: I should drop a line to my brother because I haven't written him in a long time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 写信给某人, 给...发消息

example.eg: The ship dropped anchor in Port Arthur.
Squeeze the rubber bulb of the dropper to release the liquid drop by drop.

dsense.name: drop capital, dropped capital, drop initial, dropped initial

example.eg: Before you start painting the walls, please put down a drop cloth to protect the floors.
He dropped dead of a heart attack.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 突然死亡, 粹死, 突然身亡, 落锤锻造

example.eg: I don't want to discuss the subject any more – please drop it.
He kept mentioning my marriage problems so I asked him to drop it.

dsense.name: drop kick [sth], drop-kick [sth], also US: dropkick [sth]
dsense.guideword: (sports: do a drop kick) (趁球即将落地时将其踢出)

dsense.name: drop kick [sb], drop-kick [sb], also US: dropkick [sb]

example.eg: We haven't had a drop of rain all summer and the crops are dying.
There has been a sharp drop-off in sales as the economic crisis bites.
example.egtrans: 受经济危机的影响，销售量急剧下降。

example.eg: He dropped out of school before completing his degree.
The company dropped the ball when the product was late in reaching some key markets.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 空降地区, 降落地区

example.eg: Rita could be a fashion model, with her drop-dead legs.
example.egtrans: 丽塔有这样美腿，可以去做时尚模特。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常的，极度的, 令人惊叹的，叹为观止的
非常地，极度地, 令人惊叹地，叹为观止地

dsense.name: drop-dead gorgeous
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (person: very attractive) (非正式用语)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 美呆的, 美到窒息的

example.eg: Select your country of residence from the drop-down list.
You can select accessories from a convenient drop-down list on our web site.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 救助中心, 收容中心
无须预约的诊所, 可随时造访的诊所

example.eg: There is a warehouse at the port that serves as a drop-off point, we collect the merchandise there.
Please leave all donations in the drop box next to the front door.
It's hard for high school dropouts to get a good job.
example.egtrans: 高中辍学者很难找到好工作。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 辍学者, 失学者, 中途退学者

example.eg: Dropouts make attractive boyfriends when you're a teenager, but as an adult you'll see they can be trouble.
example.egtrans: 在青少年时期，离经叛道的人是很有魅力的男友人选，但成年后你会明白，他们会惹来麻烦缠身。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 离经叛道的人, 脱离传统社会的人, 浪子

example.eg: The dropouts just couldn't handle the competition anymore.
example.egtrans: 那些中途退出比赛的人无法承受竞争。

example.eg: A typical appetizer on a Chinese restaurant menu is egg drop soup.
After staying up all night studying for her exams, Akiko was fit to drop.

dsense.name: get the drop on [sb], have the drop on [sb]

trans_examp.trans_cn: 比...更快出手, 比...更快掏枪

dsense.name: get the drop on [sb], have the drop on [sb]

trans_examp.trans_cn: 让...处于劣势, 取得相对于...的优势

example.eg: Jimmy ate too many lemon drops and began to feel sick.
Maria let drop that she wanted a new phone for her birthday.
She let drop the fact that she was single.
example.egtrans: 她无意中提到自己是单身。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 透露, 提到, 随口漏出
信件寄送点, 信件投放点

dsense.name: ready to drop
dsense.guideword: slang, vulgar (heavily pregnant) (口语，表示孩子快要出生)

example.eg: She's so huge she must be ready to drop any day now.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 准备卸货, 即将分娩

example.eg: I shouldn't have done that long hike after the gym: I'm ready to drop!
